titles.title: Civilian Agency Acquisition Workforce Improvement Act
To amend the Office of Federal Procurement Policy Act to improve the acquisition workforce of civilian Federal agencies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 6/7/1995--Introduced. Civilian Agency Acquisition Workforce Improvement Act - Amends the Office of Federal Procurement Policy Act to provide for: (1) executive agency policies and procedures for effective acquisition workforce management throughout an agency; (2) acquisition career development information for interested employees; (3) qualification requirements for various specified purchasing and contracting positions; (4) specific agency budget levels for acquisition education and training; (5) tuition assistance for agency acquisition personnel; (6) intern programs for recruiting highly qualified and talented individuals into the agency; (7) cooperative education programs for earning college credit for work in agency acquisition positions; (8) scholarship programs for qualifying individuals for such positions; and (9) specified additional functions for the Federal Acquisition Institute.
